main event: A resident of Ardmore, Oklahoma reported observing an unidentified flying object on April 9, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as saucer-like and extremely large., The object made a sharp turn and then rapidly disappeared., The witness reported the object emitted a bright, pulsating light., The sighting lasted approximately 15-16 seconds., Insufficient data was available to make a definite conclusion about the object's identity.
witness description: Mr. Sam Dunlap, a resident of Ardmore, Oklahoma who observed the object from his backyard.
